items.sentence: Tom told me that he thought that Mary was selfish.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was serious.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was outside.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was pleased.
Tom said that he heard Mary threaten to kill John.
Tom said that he could hear Mary and John arguing.
I think that Tom and Mary were talking about John.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was married.
Tom told Mary that he didn't think John was angry.
What makes you think Tom would want to go with us?
